text:
Our documentation sections not having for each subdir a index.xml are causing 
a fatal error for the intend to aggregate the whole site or parts of the 
documentation. 
 
A quick fix to get rid of the problem is to make sure that every sub dir (in 
any level) of /src/documentation/content/xdocs/docs has a index.xml!
